title: Near Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/10/17
itunes:title: Near Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/10/17
description:
George Noory and guest Dr. Pim Van Lommel discuss his research study into near death experiences and whether the human consciousness continues to exist after death.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
